name: Space Cowboy: Asteroid Escape
description:
- Follows the "Lost in Space Theme" (sort of loosely)

- Three unique alien enemies

- Three different guns

- Original code, sound effects, music, and art

Controls:

- A and D to move

- Space to jump

- Mouse to aim and shoot

- Right mouse aims in

- Left mouse shoots

- Scroll wheel or 1-3 number keys to switch weapons after finding them

Have fun!
